name: tarkov-database-website
description: The website, the main frontend of Tarkov Database

scripts.install-js: cp node_modules/mapbox-gl/dist/mapbox-gl-csp.js static/resources/js/lib/mapbox-gl-csp.min.js && cp node_modules/mapbox-gl/dist/mapbox-gl-csp-worker.js static/resources/js/lib/mapbox-gl-csp-worker.min.js && cp node_modules/chart.js/dist/chart.min.js static/resources/js/lib/chart.min.js && browserify static/resources/js/lib/turf.config.js --standalone turf > static/resources/js/lib/turf.bundle.js
scripts.install-statics: npm run install-js && npm run install-css
